Package com.github.gayanch.cache.store

Class FileSystemStorage<K,​V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.gayanch.cache.store.FileSystemStorage<K,​V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of CacheKey
    V - The type of CacheValue
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage<K,​V>
    public class FileSystemStorage<K,​V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storage<K,​V>
    Storage backend implementation for file system base cache Each instance of FileSystemStorage gets its own directory defined as STORAGE_PREFIX to avoid collisions between different cache levels

        public V read​(K key)
        Reads and returns the CacheValue for given key from storage backend We know the return type of readFile operation to be V. So no need invoke instance of operation here.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
